meanings.definition: A female given name of Ancient Greek origin.
meanings.english_definition: A female given name of Ancient Greek origin.

meanings.definition: Historical figure: Several women of the Hellenistic period, including a daughter of Priam, a wife of Antiochus II, and others.
meanings.english_definition: Several women of the Hellenistic period, including a daughter of Priam, a wife of Antiochus II, and others.

etymology.value: From Ancient Greek Λαοδίκη (Laodíkē), from λαός (laós, “people”) + δίκη (díkē, “justice”).
